overview: The domination of social media which paves the way for opportunities for everyone to express their thoughts and opinions freely not only provided vast benefit to the audience but it also created waves of disaster in the society.  To present themselves with fashion and prestigious gadgets,  few youngsters step into this new technological world with the intention changing their lives overnight. Was this actually an opportunity to transform their lives or absolute disaster waiting in the dark shades is the story of ENJOY that will reveal.  A strong social message and multitude of complications intertwined in the story, the director chose adult comedy with intense materials of laughter through youngsterâ€™s language of new technological era.  The movie will make you laugh, cry and reshape your belief of the current events happening in everyone's home.
title: Enjoy
